events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case due to dissatisfaction with the product fit.
The case has been assigned to agent Laura M. who handles refund and exchange requests.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund or exchange. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund or exchange efficiently, may I have the order number and details about the size you received?
Sure, my order number is 4527893. I ordered a medium size, but it fits way too tight and is uncomfortable for me.
Thank you for the details! We can initiate a refund or send you a larger size as an exchange. Which option do you prefer?
I would like to exchange it for a large, please. I hope the larger size fits better.
Your exchange request is processed. We've scheduled the shipment of the large size jacket and sent you a prepaid return label for the original item.
Just checking in to ensure you received the replacement jacket and that you are satisfied with the fit. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, I received the large jacket and it fits perfectly now. Thanks for the prompt help and smooth exchange process!
We are glad your issue has been resolved. Closing the case now. Thank you for your patience and for choosing our service.
